short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove annoying call to actions from ecommerce sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stress Block tones down physiological pressure on travel sites like Booking and Expedia.
The extension removes pieces of information that are planted on the page to create a sense of urgency and push the visitors into closing a deal right away, without further research.
